title: ContextSuite Semantic Event Base Event Info
description: Schema for information about a base event, used when an event is derived from one or more root events.

event_gid.description: The GID of the original root event.

type.description: The type of the original root event.

event.description: The name of the original root event.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the original root event.

message_id.description: The message ID of the original root event.

entity_gid.description: The entity GID associated with the original root event.
